Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 76th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1965...
Injured on 5/2/1966 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/28/1966 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 6/17/1968...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/14/1976 to a 1-year deal worth $3,400,000 per year...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1978...
Injured on 4/11/1980 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/30/1980 with a Broken Foot, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 4/12/1983 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis on 7/7/1985 (Going to CIN: P B. Blyleven. Going to STL: CF C. Davis, P M. Moore)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Dave Righetti (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1986, off Larry Christenson (NYM)...
Injured on 7/13/1987 with a Ruptured Achilles Tendon, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1990, hitting .448 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1990, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 5/29/1990...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1990, hitting .410 with 11 HR, 28 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1990, hitting .647 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1991, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1993, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 7/31/1994...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 9/1/1995 to a 1-year deal worth $1,056,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/3/1996 to a 1-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
